name: Ships vs Sea Monsters — Defense and Attack Game
name_original: Ships vs Sea Monsters — Defense and Attack Game
description:
People love adventures, glory and gold. But once they woke sea monsters...

Oh, my Captain! Our port and ships are attacked by terrible sea monsters! Build your navy, create a line of defense around your harbor and counterattack awful sea creatures. Fight for each port and island and kill monsters in their lair (Graveyard of ships).

Old skipper's advice: keep balance between defense (use broadside and fortress gun) and fast attack. Earn stars and upgrade your ships and port.

Features of the sea strategy:

~ dynamic tower defense genre, sea strategic battle
~ 6 lines of attack\defense,
~ creation of powerful fleet,
~ 6 kinds of ships (boat, light sailboat, submarine, air balloon, two-masted battleship, three-masted flagship)
~ ton of sea monsters (flock of piranhas, poisonous jellyfish, electric stingray, shark, sea dragon, huge octopus Kraken)
~ system of stars-and-upgrades,
~ huge map of the marine world (24 levels),
~ special abilities:

1) saving sailors (+coins),
2) turning the ships to powerful broadside (attack x2),
3) shooting from fortress gun

You are waiting for addicting free strategic game, dark atmosphere, glowing monsters and ocean of emotions.
Create your fleet and fight!
Become the captain of all the seas!
